# Vendored Opencode Copilot Provider

This package is a vendored copy of:

- Repository: `https://github.com/anomalyco/opencode`
- Source path: `packages/opencode/src/provider/sdk/copilot`

Do not edit files under `vendor/opencode-copilot/src` manually.

Use the sync script instead:

```bash
npm run sync:copilot-provider
```

Validate drift without writing:

```bash
npm run sync:copilot-provider:check
```
